mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM tl_erp_set_manage AS MANAGE WHERE 1 = 1
AND MANAGE.key_name= #{key_name}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO tl_erp_set_manage
id,
key_name,
value,
createtime,
updatetime,
createUsername,
updateUsername,
type,
user_id,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{key_name,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createtime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{updatetime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updateUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
UPDATE tl_erp_set_manage
key_name = #{key_name},
value= #{value},
createtime= #{createtime},
updatetime= #{updatetime},
createUsername= #{createUsername},
updateUsername= #{updateUsername},
type= #{type},
user_id= #{user_id},
WHERE id = #{id}
